title: Who is Khalid Ibn Al Waleed? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says who is khalid kharidam nuridi is one of the great companions of the prophet islam who uh uh is known as the sword of allah and he was a great warrior a great fighter a great commander and there are so many tales and stories of in his biography of what he had given to islam and he was the nephew of uh one of the prophet's wives alahi assalatu honey from the u.s
